alert.note: Alert for Crawford; Franklin; Washington (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Saint Louis (Eastern Missouri and West Central Illinois)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 08 at 7:37PM CDT until May 08 at 8:30PM CDT by NWS Saint Louis
info.description: The National Weather Service in St Louis has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northeastern Crawford County in east central Missouri... Northwestern Washington County in east central Missouri... South central Franklin County in east central Missouri... * Until 830 PM CDT. * At 737 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Sullivan, moving east at 15 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Sullivan, St. Clair, Bourbon, Anthonies Mill, Miramiguoa Park, St. Cloud, and Stanton. This includes Interstate 44 in Missouri between exits 218 and 230. This also includes Onondaga Cave State Park and Meramec State Park. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: Prepare immediately for large hail and deadly cloud to ground lightning. Seek shelter inside a well-built structure. Stay away from windows. To report severe weather, contact your nearest law enforcement agency. They will send your report to the National Weather Service office in St Louis. Torrential rainfall is occurring with this storm, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
